overview: Recorded live at VH1 Studios, London, England, 05/07/1996  1. Riff Raff 2. Go Down 3. You Shook Me all Night Long 4. Shoot to Thrill 5. Rock'n'Roll Ain't Noise Pollution 6. Down Payment Blues 7. The Jack 8. Whole Lotta Rosie 9. Ballbreaker 10. Gone Shootin' 11. Back in Black Bonusvideo 12. Making of "Hail Caesar"
title: AC/DC - Live at VH1 Studios
